Name: Jetlad
About the game: Challenging 2D platformer with simple graphics and controls. Play as Jetlad the space treasure hunter. He has infiltrated the Evil Face clan’s fortress. Now his goal is to collect as many gems as he can and escape. This mission won’t be easy as the fortress is filled with danger! Features: - 30 levels - Fly instead of jumping Jetlad flies around using his jetpack. His jetpack will explode when it runs out of fuel. Be sure to collect all the Fuel jugs you come across. - Three lives for each level Jetlad starts each level with three lives. If Jetlad gets hit by an enemy or runs out of fuel he will lose a life. - Three checkpoints in each level Each level contains three checkpoints. A checkpoint becomes active when Jetad comes in contact with it. When you lose a life, you will spawn at the latest active checkpoint. If no checkpoints are active, Jetlad will spawn at the starting point. - Four collectable gems in each level Jetlad desires these gems. There are three pink gems and one green gem in each level. The green gem is usually hidden in tricky locations. - Play with a controller You can play with your favorite controller! * Steam Controller Settings must be turned off. * Controller must be connected before running the game
